name: Equivalent Exchange (clay49372)
description:
This game is a rough project created for the 2021 GMTK Game Jam

The theme was 'joined together' and we interpreted that by joining your stats together in this game.

While you can (and should) shift your stats on the fly to take on enemies, you can't raise one without lowering others.

A, S, D, and F boost your Damage, Rate of Fire, Speed, and Evasion (which shrinks your hitbox)

Q, W, E, and R lower them.

Z resets your stats to base.

Hold x and/or c to shoot.

Green Crystals can be damaged by any shot

Red Crystals only take damage from projectiles with 3 or higher damage

Blue Crystals only take damage from projectiles with 4 or higher damage

Music by: Origami Repetika

Other Sound by: SpookyModem
